```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
```

## Read and tidy data

```{r}
homicide_df = read.csv("./data/homicide_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    city_state = paste(city, state, sep = ", ")
  )
```

Number of homicides per city

```{r}
total_homicides =
homicide_df %>% 
  group_by(city_state) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_homicides = n_distinct(uid)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup()
```

Number of unsolved homicides per city

```{r}
unsolved_homicides =
  homicide_df %>% 
  filter(disposition == "Closed without arrest") %>%
  group_by(city_state) %>% 
  summarize(
    n_open_homicides = n_distinct(uid)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() 
```

Tibble of total and unsolved homicides

```{r}
open_total_homicides = 
  full_join(unsolved_homicides, total_homicides)

open_total_homicides[is.na(open_total_homicides)] <- 0
```

Proportion of homicides that are unsolved in Baltimore, MD

```{r, error = TRUE}
open_total_homicides %>% 
  filter(city_state == "Baltimore, MD") %>% 
  select(-city_state) %>% 
  prop.test(open_total_homicides, 2) ##wtf is this not working
```
